HostWebis offers superior, reliable, and affordable Web Hosting to individuals and small businesses in more than 20 countries.

In order to test our new order systems on our website and give LET users a chance to know us better, we are offering 1 year hosting for just 1€ and 11.88€ after that.


Special LET Basic Hosting Package Specification:
Disk Space: 2 GB SSD
Data Transfer: 20 GB
Domains Allowed: 1
Email boxes: No limit
Free Setup
MySQL Database: 2
PHP 7.4 Support
Webmail
cPanel/WHM Control Panel
Free SSL Certificate
WordPress Manager
24×7 Support

Order link: https://www.hostwebis.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1
Coupon code for 1 year hosting for 1€: 1yearhostingfor1eur


This promotion will end on the 8th of July.

More information about us: https://www.hostwebis.com/about-us
